name: Here In Paradise
description:
As your kingdom gets attacked and your life is on the line, you suddenly wake up in another world where everything is unknown for you.

"Here In Paradise" is our first project and also the first time when we participate in a game jam. This project was lots of fun for us and a valuable learning experience. 

We've made this game for the #NaNoRenO2022 game jam, so please note this is not a polished version yet, we know there are many missing parts (some WIP artworks, some missing or unpolished story parts, etc..)

But here's what you can experience so far:

  • Playtime: 30+ minutes
  • Word Count: 10.000+ 
  • Ending Available (1/3 for now)
  • Stylized Anime Artworks
  • And interesting engaging plot

Thank you for your attention and have fun playing our game! We're open to any kind of feedback.
